post.body: Merry Christmas cuz!! Love ya!
Guess I have to grow up now....mommy can't handle 5 kids in the house. :p
is now listening to 80's internet radio on his son's PSP. Oh how far technology has come!!!!!
is extremely happy that the big kids are home. It was Christmas morning all over again.
Mommy just took my (umm...my son's actually) toy helicopter away from me. :(
Is being my daughter's make up test subject.
Good night all. I hope each and every one of you had an awesome holiday as I did.
Is sooooooooo happy he married into an Italian family!! The holiday feasts are to die for!!
Off to another Christmas celebration. Merry Christmas everyone!!
Merry Christmas everyone!!!

Me thinks Santa just visited. He's not quite as quiet as I remember. :p
Oh, and St. Nick, sorry I screwed up your cookie!! :(
Ate waaay to much today! Feel miserable and cheery at the same time. Merry Christmas to all, and to all a good night.
http://twitpic.com/vm37 - Cold in Texas!?!
Finishing up some last minute shopping with my boys.
Giants take it in OT.
I should be at this football game instead of sitting on the couch with a f'ing fever feeling like crap! :(
Once again I'm on my own to fix my X45 problems! Dammit.
2 hour delay turned into a full on snow day! Without the snow, we are in Texas afterall. :(
Hmmmm.....kids' schools delayed 2 hours. So much for getting things done this morning.
is headed to bed.
